name: WolfWars
description: WolfWars is a fantasy tactical strategy card game that you will be able to build or edit your decks with available cards and heroes.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista (32/64-bit) Processor: Single Core, 500MHZ Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 256 MB DirectX: Version 7.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 (32/64-bit) Processor: Dual Core Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 1024 MB DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1000 MB available space
